Texts.Chs: 把^green;9个铜线^reset;带给^orange;维纳利斯^reset;。
我给你准备了一个^orange;三度仪^reset;！快试试它的^green;3种^orange;基本功能^reset;。 打开^green;右键^reset;菜单并查找你要尝试的任务。选择它。
Texts.Eng: I have a ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; here for you! ^orange;Try out its ^green;3^orange; primary functions^reset; as soon as possible. Open up the ^green;Right-Click^reset; menu from it and look for a task you wish to attempt. Select it.

Texts.Chs: 现在，用你的^orange;加工台^reset;制造9个^orange;铜线^reset;给我。我会给你紧急修复一下^green;传送门^reset;，这样你就可以^green;传送到遥远的地方^reset;，比如^orange;科学前哨站^reset;!
Texts.Eng: Use your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; now, and create 9 ^orange;Wire^reset; and bring them to me. I'll jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset; so that you can ^green;warp to distant locations^reset; such as the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;!.
